about_the_game:
In this cross-board action game, you will face a difficult life in the post-nuclear war post-apocalyptic underworld and experience elements such as action upgrades, interacting with your family, resource collection and distribution in the game.

1: This is a hardcore action game, in the face of monsters every action must be very careful, otherwise it is easy to die. The characters have 6 attack moves and 3 dodge moves. Characters and monsters will be hit by the value system to determine the different state.
2: Rogue-like elements, the death of the character does not end the game, will inherit part of the resources to reborn, the death of the family is the end of the game round.
3: Family system, each round of the game will begin with a random family, parents, wife, brothers, etc.. Each family member can do different things for you, and each family member consumes different resources.
4: 1 shelter map, 3 adventure maps. Collect resources in these places and distribute them to yourself and your family.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be bloodshed and amputation images in the battle, and some very subtle sexual innuendo and images in the interaction with NPCs.

name: 末日迷窟 Doomsday Cave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is the post-nuclear war post-apocalyptic underworld as the background of the horizontal action survival game, you have to constantly collect resources to maintain their own and their family's survival consumption.
